title: Epigenetic Easter Eggs, Locusts, Dune’s Bene-Gesserit Breeding Program, and God’s Shadow Matriarchy
description: Reflections on the symbolism of eggs in Easter and Passover, the genetic and epigenetic consequences of the fall, how learning more about biology impacts the way we interpret the Bible, and how God manages his secret breeding program through the female line from Eve to Mary.
